snippet.title: Farm Slider Trailer
snippet.description:
The trailer of our new upcoming game Farm Slider!

Farm Slider: Easy to play, challenging to finish and impossible to put down.

Hours and hours of puzzling fun for all ages. Challenge your ability to think ahead in our new, minimalistic puzzle game. The game contains 32 levels with pictures of farm towns and roads, 
but: they’re out of place! Slide the tiles to match the example above to complete the level. 

Some may seem impossible at first, but we promise: they CAN all be done!

Download the Android version here: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ludomo.townslider

Credits to Michiel Nijman for the soundtrack http://www.michielnijhof.nl
